com.zhonghu.sip.wizard

接口 WizardIface

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BaseImplementation, SimpleImplementation, Wizard

    public interface WizardIface

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      SipProfile buildAccount(SipProfile account)
      Build the account based on preference view contents.
      boolean canSave() 
      boolean needRestart()
      Does the wizard changes something that requires to restart sip stack?

    • 方法详细资料

      • buildAccount

        SipProfile buildAccount(SipProfile account)
        Build the account based on preference view contents.
        参数:
        account - The sip profile already saved in database
        返回:
        the sip profile to save into databse based on fields contents.

      • setDefaultParams

        void setDefaultParams(PreferencesWrapper prefs)
        Set default global application preferences. This is a hook method to set preference when an account is saved with this profile. It's useful for sip providers that needs global settings hack.
        参数:
        prefs - The preference wrapper interface.

      • canSave

        boolean canSave()

      • needRestart

        boolean needRestart()
        Does the wizard changes something that requires to restart sip stack? If so once saved, the wizard will also ask for a stack restart to take into account any preference changed with setDefaultParams(PreferencesWrapper)
        返回:
        true if the wizard would like the sip stack to restart

      • onActivityResult

        void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                      int resultCode,
                      Intent data)

      • onStart

        void onStart()

      • onStop

        void onStop()

      • setUserName

        void setUserName(java.lang.String userName)

      • setPassWord

        void setPassWord(java.lang.String passWords)
